post.title: AI May be Responsible For More Layoffs than Reported
post.excerpt: In recent layoffs, AI’s role may be bigger than companies are letting on. Oh joy, underrepresenting the threat to our economy: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/07/20/in-job-losses-ais-role-may-be-bigger-than-companies-say.html
